item.description:
This agricultural fair has a lot to see and do - check out their website!

www.topsfieldfair.org/tour%20the%20fair.htm

Meet at the "Meeting Place" area right inside the Main Gate at a flag pole, where there is a banner that says "meeting place."

Admission is $12 and there is a parking fee of $8, so carpooling is recommended.

Some of the things to see:

Clydesdale horses
beekeeping
beeswax candle making
arts & crafts
food demos
folk and rock music
cock crowing and hen flying contests
birds of prey
police K-9 unit demos
marionettes
curious creatures
racing pigs
magic shows
bunny nursery
dairy goat show
pumpkin carving
item.name: Topsfield Fair
